text: 13|2|Allaha se'ijana, yijane akasasamuhaka khumtabihina oparata sthapana karaiche, yito tomaloke dekha poraa. Tara pichata te'om arasbara oparata uthiche arau surya arau candraka niyamadhina karaiche, pratyekatorae eta nirdista samaya laike abartana karaiba. Teraemi sakalo bisaya paraicalana karae, ayatasamuha bisadabharae barnana karae, yate tomaloke tomalokara pratipalakara lagata saksata samparke niscita bisbasa karaiba paraa.
